javadoc: Factory class to instantiate and cache {@link DWARFRegisterMappings} objects.

methods.name: hasDWARFRegisterMapping
methods.comment:
Returns true if the specified LanguageDescription has DWARF register
 mappings.

throws.comment: if there was an error in the language LDEF file.

return.comment: true if the language has a DWARF register mapping specified

methods.name: hasDWARFRegisterMapping
methods.comment:
Returns true if the specified Language has DWARF register
 mappings.

throws.comment: if there was an error in the language LDEF file.

return.comment: true if the language has a DWARF register mapping specified

methods.name: getMappingForLang
methods.comment: Returns a possibly cached DWARFRegisterMappings object for the specified language,

params.name: lang
params.comment: Language to get the matching DWARF register mappings for

throws.comment: if mapping not found or invalid

methods.name: getDWARFRegisterMappingFileFor
methods.comment:
Returns ResourceFile that should contain the specified language's DWARF register
 mapping, never null.

params.name: lang
params.comment: Language to find the mapping file for.

throws.comment: if not a Sleigh language or no mapping specified or multiple mappings specified.

return.comment: ResourceFile of where the mapping file should be, never null.

methods.javadoc:
Finds the DWARF register mapping information file specified in the specified language's LDEF file and returns a new {@link DWARFRegisterMappings} object containing the data read from that file.

Throws {@link IOException} if the lang does not have a mapping or it is invalid.

@param lang {@link Language} to read the matching DWARF register mappings for @return a new {@link DWARFRegisterMappings} instance, created from information read from the {@link #DWARF_REGISTER_MAPPING_NAME} xml file referenced in the language's LDEF, never null. @throws IOException if there is no DWARF register mapping file associated with the specified {@link Language} or if there was an error in the register mapping data.
methods.name: readMappingForLang
methods.comment:
Finds the DWARF register mapping information file specified in the specified
 language's LDEF file and returns a new DWARFRegisterMappings object
 containing the data read from that file.
 
 Throws IOException if the lang does not have a mapping or it is invalid.

params.name: lang
params.comment: Language to read the matching DWARF register mappings for

throws.comment:
if there is no DWARF register mapping file associated with
 the specified Language or if there was an error in the register mapping data.

return.comment:
a new DWARFRegisterMappings instance, created from information read
 from the #DWARF_REGISTER_MAPPING_NAME xml file referenced in the language's
 LDEF, never null.

methods.name: readMappingFrom
methods.comment: Creates a new DWARFRegisterMappings from the data present in the xml element.

params.name: rootElem
params.comment:
JDom XML element containing the dwarf root element of the
 mapping file.

params.name: lang
params.comment: The Ghidra Language that the DWARF register mapping applies to

throws.comment: if missing or invalid data found in xml

return.comment: a new DWARFRegisterMappings instance, never null.

name: DWARFRegisterMappingsManager
comment: Factory class to instantiate and cache DWARFRegisterMappings objects.
